document.full_text: the international criminal tribunal for rwanda sentenced maj. gen. augustin bizimungu to 30 years in prison for ordering killings during the 1994 genocide.
document.title: africa: rwanda: ex-army chief gets 30 years
lines_and_colors: the international criminal tribunal for rwanda sentenced maj. gen. augustin bizimungu to 30 years in prison for ordering killings during the 1994 genocide.
